title: [Snyk] SNYK-PYTHON-PILLOW-6514866 in pillow@9.5.0
description:
## Buffer Overflow

**Severity:** medium
**Package:** pillow@9.5.0
**File:** `score-processor-lambda/requirements.txt`

**CVSS Score:** 5.9  
**Snyk Priority Score:** 509/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2024-28219](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-28219)

**Fix:** Pin `pillow` to version 10.3.0 or later.

### Details
## Overview

Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Buffer Overflow via the `strcpy` function in `_imagingcms.c`, due to two calls that were able to copy too much data into fixed length strings.
## Remediation
Upgrade `pillow` to version 10.3.0 or higher.
## References
- [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/python-pillow/Pillow/commit/2776126aa9af322b416eaca247f4f8ebefd08128)
- [GitHub PR](https://github.com/python-pillow/Pillow/pull/7928)


### Reference
- [Snyk advisory](https://security.snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-PYTHON-PILLOW-6514866)
